languages.text: "Вероятно. Вчера ты еще обычн{mf|ый|ая} слуга Империума, од{mf|ин|на} из миллионов ничем не отличающихся людей. Сегодня за тобой являются люди в цветах дома фон Валанциус и без объяснений и разговоров препровождают на шаттл и судно, которое отправляется в путешествие в далекий {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простор Коронус{/g}. Но такова природа моей позиции, {name}. Мое требование — священно, и не подлежит обсуждению. Мне нужны все, в ком есть хотя бы крупица крови династии, кем бы эти люди не оказались".

traits.locale_text: "Вероятно. Вчера ты еще обычн{mf|ый|ая} слуга Империума, од{mf|ин|на} из миллионов ничем не отличающихся людей. Сегодня за тобой являются люди в цветах дома фон Валанциус и без объяснений и разговоров препровождают на шаттл и судно, которое отправляется в путешествие в далекий {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простор Коронус{/g}. Но такова природа моей позиции, {name}. Мое требование — священно, и не подлежит обсуждению. Мне нужны все, в ком есть хотя бы крупица крови династии, кем бы эти люди не оказались".

languages.text: "Perhaps. Yesterday, you were just another servant of the Imperium, one of the faceless multitudes. Today, visitors in the von Valancius colours come to you without any explanation and escort you to a vessel that departs for the far-off {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. But such is the nature of my position, {name}. My claim on you is sacred and non-negotiable. I require all those who possess even a drop of the von Valancius blood, no matter who they may be."
languages.original_text: "Вероятно. Вчера ты еще обычн{mf|ый|ая} слуга Империума, од{mf|ин|на} из миллионов ничем не отличающихся людей. Сегодня за тобой являются люди в цветах дома фон Валанциус и без объяснений и разговоров препровождают на шаттл и судно, которое отправляется в путешествие в далекий {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простор Коронус{/g}. Но такова природа моей позиции, {name}. Мое требование — священно, и не подлежит обсуждению. Мне нужны все, в ком есть хотя бы крупица крови династии, кем бы эти люди не оказались".

traits.locale_text: "I imagine your expropriation was truly unexpected. Yesterday, you were just another servant of the Imperium, one of the millions of identical people. Today, visitors in the von Valancius colours come to you without any explanation and escort you to a vessel that departs for the faraway {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. But such is the nature of my position, {name}. My demand is sacred and non-negotiable. I require all with at least a drop of the von Valancius blood, no matter who those people may be."

"I imagine your expropriation was truly unexpected. Yesterday, you were just another servant of the Imperium, one of the millions of identical people. Today, visitors in the von Valancius colours come to you without any explanation and escort you to a vessel that departs for the far-off {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. But such is the nature of my position, {name}. My claim on you is sacred and non-negotiable. I require all those who possess even a drop of the von Valancius blood, no matter who they may be."

languages.text: “或许是吧。昨天你还是帝国的仆人，仅仅是无数芸芸众生之一。而今天，穿着冯·瓦兰修斯家族制服的访客来到你身边，没有任何解释，就把你护送到了遥远的{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的虚空舰上。不过，我的地位赋予了我这样的权力，{name}。我对你们的要求神圣不可侵犯，也没有任何商量余地。所有流淌冯·瓦兰修斯家族血统的人，无论他们是什么人，都必须来到我的船上。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps. Yesterday, you were just another servant of the Imperium, one of the faceless multitudes. Today, visitors in the von Valancius colours come to you without any explanation and escort you to a vessel that departs for the far-off {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. But such is the nature of my position, {name}. My claim on you is sacred and non-negotiable. I require all those who possess even a drop of the von Valancius blood, no matter who they may be."

traits.locale_text: “或许是吧。昨天你还是帝国的仆人，仅仅是无数芸芸众生之一。而今天，穿着冯·瓦兰修斯家族制服的访客来到你身边，没有任何解释，就把你护送到了遥远的{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯星域{/g}的虚空舰上。不过，我的地位赋予了我这样的权力，{name}。我对你们的要求神圣不可侵犯，也没有任何商量余地。所有流淌冯·瓦兰修斯家族血统的人，无论他们是什么人，都必须来到我的船上。”

languages.text: «Es posible. Ayer no eras más que otr{mf|o|a} sierv{mf|o|a} común del Imperium, un{mf|o|a} más entre la multitud. Hoy, unos visitantes con el uniforme de los von Valancius llegan y te escoltan a una nave rumbo a la lejana {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}. Pero así es mi cargo, {name}. Mi autoridad sobre ti es sagrada y no está sujeta a negociaciones. Necesito a todos cuantos posean una sola gota de sangre von Valancius, sean quienes sean».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps. Yesterday, you were just another servant of the Imperium, one of the faceless multitudes. Today, visitors in the von Valancius colours come to you without any explanation and escort you to a vessel that departs for the far-off {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. But such is the nature of my position, {name}. My claim on you is sacred and non-negotiable. I require all those who possess even a drop of the von Valancius blood, no matter who they may be."

traits.locale_text: «Es posible. Ayer no eras más que otr{mf|o|a} sierv{mf|o|a} común del Imperium, un{mf|o|a} más entre la multitud. Hoy, unos visitantes con el uniforme de los von Valancius llegan y te escoltan a una nave rumbo a la lejana {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}. Pero así es mi cargo, {name}. Mi autoridad sobre ti es sagrada y no está sujeta a negociaciones. Necesito a todos cuantos posean una sola gota de sangre von Valancius, sean quienes sean».

languages.text: 「おそらく。昨日、あなたは帝国のただの使用人の一人だった。それなのに今日、フォン・ヴァランシウス系の訪問者が何の説明ももなくあなたのところにやって来て、遠く離れた{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}に向けて出発する船まであなたを護衛する。しかし、これが私の立場の性質なのだ、{name}。あなたに対する私の主張は神聖であり、交渉の余地はない。私は、たとえ誰であろうと、フォン・ヴァランシウスの血を一滴でも持っているすべての人にこれを要求する」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps. Yesterday, you were just another servant of the Imperium, one of the faceless multitudes. Today, visitors in the von Valancius colours come to you without any explanation and escort you to a vessel that departs for the far-off {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. But such is the nature of my position, {name}. My claim on you is sacred and non-negotiable. I require all those who possess even a drop of the von Valancius blood, no matter who they may be."

traits.locale_text: 「たぶん。昨日、あなたは帝国のただの使用人の一人だった。今日はフォン・ヴァランシウス系の訪問者が何の説明ももなくあなたのところにやって来て、遠く離れた{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}に向けて出発する船まであなたを護衛する。しかし、これが私の立場の性質なのです、{name}。あなたに対する私の主張は神聖であり、交渉の余地はありません。私は、たとえ誰であろうと、フォン・ヴァランシウスの血を一滴でも持っているすべての人にこれを要求します」

「おそらく。昨日、あなたは帝国のただの使用人の一人だった。それなのに今日、フォン・ヴァランシウス系の訪問者が何の説明ももなくあなたのところにやって来て、遠く離れた{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}に向けて出発する船まであなたを護衛する。しかし、これが私の立場の性質なのだ、{name}。あなたに対する私の主張は神聖であり、交渉の余地はない。私は、たとえ誰であろうと、フォン・ヴァランシウスの血を一滴でも持っているすべての人にこれを要求する」

languages.text: « Peut-être. Hier encore, vous n'étiez qu'{mf|un serviteur|une servante} de l'Imperium, anonyme au sein d'une foule sans visage. Aujourd'hui, des inconnus portant les couleurs des von Valancius se sont présentés à vous et, sans la moindre explication, vous ont {mf|escorté|escortée} à bord d'un vaisseau qui a immédiatement mis le cap vers les lointaines {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. Mais telle est la nature de ma fonction, {name}. Mon droit à votre encontre est sacré et non négociable. J'ai besoin de tous ceux qui possèdent la moindre trace du sang des von Valancius, quels qu'ils soient. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps. Yesterday, you were just another servant of the Imperium, one of the faceless multitudes. Today, visitors in the von Valancius colours come to you without any explanation and escort you to a vessel that departs for the far-off {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. But such is the nature of my position, {name}. My claim on you is sacred and non-negotiable. I require all those who possess even a drop of the von Valancius blood, no matter who they may be."

traits.locale_text: « Peut-être. Hier encore, vous n'étiez qu'{mf|un serviteur|une servante} de l'Imperium, anonyme au sein d'une foule sans visage. Aujourd'hui, des inconnus portant les couleurs des von Valancius se sont présentés à vous et, sans la moindre explication, vous ont {mf|escorté|escortée} à bord d'un vaisseau qui a immédiatement mis le cap vers les lointaines {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. Mais telle est la nature de ma fonction, {name}. Mon droit à votre encontre est sacré et non négociable. J'ai besoin de tous ceux qui possèdent la moindre trace du sang des von Valancius, quels qu'ils soient. »

languages.text: "Mag sein. Gestern wart Ihr nur {mf|ein weiterer Diener|eine weitere Dienerin} des Imperiums, ein Teil einer gesichtslosen Masse. Heute besuchen Euch Vertreter in den Farben derer von Valancius und bringen Euch ohne Erklärung zu einem Schiff, das in die weit entfernte {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} aufbricht. Aber dergestalt ist nun einmal meine Position, {name}. Mein Anspruch auf Euch ist heilig und nicht verhandelbar. Ich brauche alle, die auch nur einen Tropfen Von-Valancius-Blut in sich tragen, wer immer sie sein mögen."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps. Yesterday, you were just another servant of the Imperium, one of the faceless multitudes. Today, visitors in the von Valancius colours come to you without any explanation and escort you to a vessel that departs for the far-off {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. But such is the nature of my position, {name}. My claim on you is sacred and non-negotiable. I require all those who possess even a drop of the von Valancius blood, no matter who they may be."

traits.locale_text: "Mag sein. Gestern wart Ihr nur {mf|ein weiterer Diener|eine weitere Dienerin} des Imperiums, ein Teil einer gesichtslosen Masse. Heute besuchen Euch Vertreter in den Farben derer von Valancius und bringen Euch ohne Erklärung zu einem Schiff, das in die weit entfernte {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} aufbricht. Aber dergestalt ist nun einmal meine Position, {name}. Mein Anspruch auf Euch ist heilig und nicht verhandelbar. Ich brauche alle, die auch nur einen Tropfen Von-Valancius-Blut in sich tragen, wer immer sie sein mögen."

languages.text: "Mümkündür. Daha dün İmparatorluk'un alelade bir hizmetkârıydın, adı sanı duyulmamış milyonlardan biriydin. Bugünse von Valancius üniforması giyen ziyaretçiler, hiçbir açıklama yapmadan sana geliyor ve seni uzaktaki {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'ne{/g} yollanan bir gemiye bindiriyorlar. Ama makamımın tabiatı budur {name}. Üstündeki hakkım kutsaldır, tartışmaya kapalıdır. Kim oldukları fark etmeksizin tek bir damla von Valancius kanı taşıyanlara dahi ihtiyacım var."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps. Yesterday, you were just another servant of the Imperium, one of the faceless multitudes. Today, visitors in the von Valancius colours come to you without any explanation and escort you to a vessel that departs for the far-off {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. But such is the nature of my position, {name}. My claim on you is sacred and non-negotiable. I require all those who possess even a drop of the von Valancius blood, no matter who they may be."

traits.locale_text: "Mümkündür. Daha dün İmparatorluk'un alelade bir hizmetkârıydın, adı sanı duyulmamış milyonlarından biriydin. Bugünse von Valancius üniforması giyen ziyaretçiler hiçbir açıklama yapmadan sana geliyor ve seni uzaktaki {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'ne doğru yola çıkan bir gemiye bindiriyorlar. Ama makamımın tabiatı budur {name}. Üstündeki hakkım kutsaldır, tartışmaya kapalıdır. Kim olurlarsa olsunlar tek bir damla von Valancius kanı taşıyanlara dahi ihtiyacım var."

languages.original_text: "Perhaps. Yesterday, you were just another servant of the Imperium, one of the faceless multitudes. Today, visitors in the von Valancius colours come to you without any explanation and escort you to a vessel that departs for the far-off Koronus Expanse. But such is the nature of my position, . My claim on you is sacred and non-negotiable. I require all those who possess even a drop of the von Valancius blood, no matter who they may be."
